definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: From time to time, some of my readers take a stab at converting me to their religion.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些读者时常尝试把我转变成他们的宗教的信徒。

sentences.english: He has been pressing to return to China to advocate for greater cultural and religious freedoms for his followers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直努力回到天朝为他的信徒争取文化和总角子有。

sentences.english: There seems to have been some very faithful servants of Christ in the Ephesian church.
sentences.chinese: 特别是在以弗所的教会，更有很多忠心事主的信徒。

sentences.english: You must become the one who comprehends the meaning of Jesus' sayings.
sentences.chinese: 你们必须要成为全了解耶稣说的是什么意思的信徒。

sentences.english: For the general follower, it is the sacred object is which worshiped and culted.
sentences.chinese: 对于一般信徒，它是供奉礼拜神佛的神圣对象。

sentences.english: The temple was full of devotees wanting to pray to the god.
sentences.chinese: 当时这庙里挤满了要向神祈祷的信徒。

sentences.english: The believers at Colosse had faith in Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 歌罗西的信徒对耶稣基督有信心。

sentences.english: Twilight Hammer cultist named The Manipulator will come out of the portal and attack.
sentences.chinese: 一个名叫操纵者的暮光信徒会从门出来攻击你。

sentences.english: The Holy Spirit indwells every believer in Christ.
sentences.chinese: 圣灵内住在每一位信靠基督的信徒里。

sentences.english: Knowing the Pentecostals has enriched and changed my life.
sentences.chinese: 认识圣灵降临节的信徒们丰富并且改变了我的生活。

sentences.english: Spread his word for non-believers left on earth.
sentences.chinese: 散布他的言词，使得非信徒离开地球。

sentences.english: Only believers have the spiritual gift of being blessed.
sentences.chinese: 只有信徒才有这种被祝福的属灵礼物。

sentences.english: We need more than the Bible in order to grow; we need other believers.
sentences.chinese: 若要成长，除了读圣经外，我们还需要其他信徒。

sentences.english: We believe in the priesthood of all believers, the parity of ministers and the laity.
sentences.chinese: 信徒皆为祭司，受职者与平信徒同心服事。

sentences.english: We believe in the priesthood of all believers, the parity of ministers and the laity.
sentences.chinese: 信徒皆为祭司，受职者与平信徒同心服事。

sentences.english: The second step was in the house of Cornelius, when the Gentile believers were baptized in the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 第二步是在哥尼流家里，把外邦的信徒浸在圣灵里。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
